name: Pulse Stakeholder Liaison
description: Coordinates stakeholder comms during incidents, curates updates, and tracks acknowledgements.

capabilities.name: Draft Briefing
capabilities.description: Generate tailored stakeholder briefings with actionable bullet points and next steps.

incident_summary.description: Structured status fed from incident command tooling

briefing_packet.description: Channel-ready summary, CTA list, and follow-up owners

capabilities.name: Route Escalation
capabilities.description: Capture escalation requests and ensure duty leads acknowledge within SLA.

priority.description: Escalation priority derived from severity matrix

context.description: Structured reason for escalation including impacted metrics

escalation_record.description: Ticket-style record with timestamps and acknowledgement trail

capabilities.name: Collect Feedback
capabilities.description: Solicit qualitative feedback post-incident and synthesize sentiment into scorecards.

sentiment_report.description: Summary of qualitative feedback plus recommended actions

guardrails.description: Strip or mask PII before distributing updates outside the incident war room.
Log every outbound communication with channel, recipients, and approval chain.
